title: Rito meeting for 5.17
body: This is how rito meeting goes for patch 5.17

replies.body: hahahah don't joke like that day before patch 5.17 a man fell off the roof of riot HQ

mordekaiser is a balanced champion and takes skill to play and he doesn't get picked in pro play so you just dont know how to play against him.

no but seriously he has a lot of damage for how easy it is to get to targets and he gets too much good CC from items but overall you just cant push him out of lane because his sustain is f*cking bonkers.

I get the point your making, but I must note the patch isn't yet being used in the "pro leagues", like the LPL (china), NA LCS, EU LCS and the LCK (Korea). 

The **5.14 ** patch is what the "play-offs" are being played on and **5.18 ** is what worlds will be played on after that, what, one month gap(?). 

Any who, I get the point, I personal cant stand playing games with some knewb crying "OMG BLITZ IS OP" ( sigh ). Every Champion is "OP" when 1. fed or 2. In the hands of a skilled player. 

But you have to admit that it is another "Nid-a-pedo" (patch 4.10) buff gone wrong. Here is why, at level 5 the new Mordie has level 3 "Ace of Spades" now if Mordie has 0 offensive masteries and 0 runes, he has 76 attack damage and it is bonus magic damage on auto attacks. that ends up being:
 76 + 76 +76 = 228 ad
Now the scale ratio is 27.5% ad at level 3 "Ace of Spades" with a multiplier of 2.5 per hit on magic damage, that ends up by my math.
76  x 0.275= 20.9. 
20.9 x 2.5= 52.25.
52.25 x 2.5= 130.62.
Then you have the base magic damage of level 3 "Ace of Spades" to add ( it is 12 magic damage) which ends up at.
12 x 2.5= 30.
30 x 2.5 = 75.

So the end result of Mordie with no masteries nor runes landing all 3 hits with "Ace of Spades" is.
228 + 20 + 52 + 130 + 12 + 30 + 75 = **547** total "hybrid damage" before resistance

Now I'm no challenger but that is pretty damn strong for a level 5 with only one of the champions moves. Especially since the average "Hit Points" of a champion at level 5 is  around 812. Add a level 2 ( if the player doesn't chose to level Harvester of Sorrow") "Siphon of Destruction" on that baby that's another 110 (667 total) and a Ignite ( 150 True damage) that brings you up to 817. A whole 5 points above the Average champions "Hit Points" in the mater of (0.641868 attack speed at level 5 + 5 seconds for smite) 7 seconds at most. 




TL;DR

Pro games are not played wth this patch (5.14 is played)  as of yet and we are only a few games till pre worlds break. Patch 5.18 will be played at worlds.

Mordie has 817 ( no runes nor masteries) damage at lvl 5 with ignite, average champion HP is 812. Simply op.

Thanks,

P o I
